title: OT48: Open Your Heart
summary:
Key ideas:
- This is a bi-weekly open thread
- SSC meetups happened in California and some people want them to happen more often
- Some people want a forum to replace the open thread system
- The author has been posting less due to vacation but will return to normal schedule
- Comment of the week is about 4Chan vs. SomethingAwful in internet culture wars
- Book 1 of Unsong is finished and available to read

Key learnings:
- The open thread is for any topic
- There are SSC and EA meetups that interested parties can attend
- The subreddit is an option for a forum
- The author has been on vacation but will post more frequently now
- 4Chan and SomethingAwful have played roles in internet culture wars
- Book 1 of Unsong is available in a chunk to read
